components.name: Customer Support Center

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Multiple Network in Kenya

incidents.name: Messages not Retrievable via the Messaging Logs API or Visible in the Messaging Console

incident_updates.body: Our Engineers are continuing to investigate this incident and are aiming to update the affected records with the latest data. We will provide an update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

DEVELOPER TOOLS - REST API

incident_updates.body: Our Engineers are continuing to investigate this incident and are aiming to update the affected records with the latest data. We will provide an update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incident_updates.body: Our Engineers are continuing to investigate this incident and are aiming to update the affected records with the latest data. We will provide an update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: DEVELOPER TOOLS - Console
DEVELOPER TOOLS - REST API

incident_updates.body:
Some messages created between 05:00-05:10 and 05:30-05:40 UTC on Oct 28 which were not retrievable via the Messaging Logs API and the Messaging Console are now accessible, but may still contain partial metadata. We will continue investigating and aim to update the affected records with the latest data.
Update for: https://status.twilio.com/incidents/qjwj2yvjzfh0

scheduled_maintenances.name: Brazil SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in Brazil is conducting a planned maintenance from 05 November 2025 at 23:00 PST until 06 November 2025 at 02:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from NEXTEL, TIM, Claro, Vivo, CTBC, Novalink, Cinco, Sercomtel, Twilio, Brisanet Servicos De Telecomunicacoes SA, Telmacell, Cubic Telecom, Unicel, Telemat Cel, VMNO COMUNICACOES DO BRASIL, America Net, Surf Telecom, Datora and Ligue Telecomunicacoes LTDA Brazil handsets via Brazil long codes and short codes.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2

incident_updates.body:
The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 10 November 2025 at 12:00 PST until 26 November 2025 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

10 November 2025 at 12:00 PST until 10 November 2025 at 16:00 PST
12 November 2025 at 12:00 PST until 12 November 2025 at 16:00 PST
17 November 2025 at 12:00 PST until 17 November 2025 at 16:00 PST
24 November 2025 at 12:00 PST until 24 November 2025 at 16:00 PST
26 November 2025 at 12:00 PST until 26 November 2025 at 16:00 PST

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - Small US Carriers

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

A subset of small networks in the US are conducting an emergency maintenance from 05 November 2025 at 21:00 PST until 06 November 2025 at 01:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US carriers handsets.

We are aware of the short notice and are working with our Carrier Partners to provide earlier notification where possible.
